name: Albacore Tuna

characteristics_predators: Humans, halibut, salmon, sharks, bluefish, striped bass, weakfish, and other fishes

name: Angelfish
characteristics_slogan: There are 70 different species!

name: Arapaima
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Red tail

name: Banana Eel

name: Barb
characteristics_slogan: There are over 1768 known species!

name: Barracuda
characteristics_slogan: Can grow to nearly 2 meters long!
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Large body size and powerful jaws

name: Barramundi Fish
characteristics_other_name(s): Asian sea bass, giant sea perch

name: Betta Fish (Siamese Fighting Fish)

name: Carp

characteristics_biggest_threat: Over fishing, habitat loss, and pollution

name: Cobia Fish

name: Crappie Fish
characteristics_other_name(s): White perch, paper mouths, strawberry bass, and more.

name: Crucian Carp

characteristics_other_name(s): English carp, golden carp, gibele and Prussian carp
characteristics_predators: Bass, European catfish, European smelt, blue tilapia, snakes, northern pike, Little egret

name: Danios
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: Stripes down the side of most species

name: Dragonfish
characteristics_prey: Eggs, insects, insect larvae, planktons, small invertebrates

name: Electric Catfish
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: The three pairs of barbells on the face

characteristics_other_name(s): White tuna, butterfish, ex-lax fish, skolier, black oilfish, tuna minyak, snake mackerel, waloo
characteristics_habitat: Temperate and tropical oceans save the northern Indian Ocean

name: Football Fish

characteristics_predators: Whales, sharks, and other football fish

characteristics_prey: Shrimp, crabs, lobsters, octopus, worms, frogs, mussels, clams, oysters, snails, sea slugs, lizards and other small fish

name: Gar
characteristics_estimated_population_siz: The gar evolved from an ancient lineage of fish!
characteristics_slogan: Can grow to more than 3m long!

name: Garden Eel
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: snakelike bodies partially protruding from the sand

name: Grass Carp
characteristics_prey: Aquatic plants, invertebrates, insects, and organic matter

characteristics_prey: Worms, sea stars, urchins, sand dollars, mollusks, crustaceans, fish, and eggs

characteristics_estimated_population_siz: About 30,000, largest population in Lake Michigan. The fish’s conservation status is least concern.

characteristics_predators: Humans, silver lampreys and sea lampreys

characteristics_other_name(s): Jeweled Rockskipper, algae blenny, banded blenny, banded-jeweled blenny, barred blenny, lineated blenny, lined blenny, painted blenny, sailfin blenny.

name: Lizardfish
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: The lizard-like head and sharp teeth

name: Loach
characteristics_other_name(s): Clown loach, kuhli loach, hillstream loach

characteristics_other_name(s): The needle nose gar or the Billy gar

name: Mahi Mahi (Dolphin Fish)
characteristics_other_name(s): Dorado, llampuga (Spanish), lampuka (Malta), lampuga or capone (Sicily), Coryphene (French), Goldmakrel (German), Shiira (Japanese)

characteristics_other_name(s): Dowdies, oyster crackers, and oyster catchers

name: Parrotfish
characteristics_habitat: Coral reefs, seagrass beds, and coasts

characteristics_slogan: Generally found in fast-flowing streams!

name: Salmon

characteristics_weight: Eyes on top of its head
characteristics_height: These fish suck prey in like a vacuum or use a tentacle-like appendage
characteristics_distinctive_feature: These fish suck prey in like a vacuum or use a tentacle-like appendage
characteristics_special_features: An organ on their heads helps these fish deter predators and disable prey with shocks

name: Ribbon Eel

characteristics_prey: Coral reef, snails, and small fishes

characteristics_lifespan: Bigmouth buffalo can live up to 112 years!

name: Telescope Fish
characteristics_habitat: Deep sea depths of world oceans

name: Goldfish

characteristics_prey: Smaller fish, invertebrates, crustaceans, shrimp, crabs, sea urchins

characteristics_distinctive_feature: Inflatable body and sharp poisonous spikes

characteristics_estimated_population_siz: Though the exact population of surgeonfish is not known, none of these fish appear to be endangered. The overall conservation status is not evaluated.

name: Wolf Eel

name: Lionfish

name: Milkfish

name: Monkfish
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: Large mouth and unique "lure" to attract prey

characteristics_lifespan: Different species live from 10 to 30 years
characteristics_weight: The angler can weigh up to 127 pounds!

name: Wolffish
characteristics_prey: Crabs, clams, sea urchins, starfish, and others

name: Guppy

name: Molly
characteristics_slogan: Known for their calm and peaceful nature!
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Large-sized fins and bear live young

name: Trout
taxonomy_scientific_name: Salmo obtusirostris, Salmo trutta, Salmo trutta morpha fario, Oncorhynchus clarki, O.c. pleuricius, Oncorhynchus mykiss, Salvelinus fontinalis, Salvelinus malma, Salvelinus confluentus

name: Giant Clam
characteristics_slogan: Can reach nearly 4ft in length!

characteristics_prey: Plankton, waste and debris from water

name: Oyster
characteristics_slogan: Can process up to 10 litres of water an hour!

name: Blanket Octopus
characteristics_estimated_population_siz: Unknown, but status is Least Concern

name: Vampire Squid

name: Octopus
characteristics_slogan: There are around 300 different species!

name: Squid
characteristics_slogan: Some species are known to have 10 arms!

name: Basking Shark
characteristics_slogan: The second biggest fish in the world!
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Enormous mouth and large body size

name: Blue Shark

characteristics_predators: Tiger sharks, great white sharks, orcas, humans, sea lions

name: Bonnethead Shark

characteristics_other_name(s): Bonnet shark, shovelhead shark, Bonnetnose shark, bonnet hammerhead
characteristics_length: 20 to 39 inches in length. Females are larger.

name: Bull Shark
characteristics_slogan: Unpredictable and aggressive temperament!
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Flat, rounded snout and two dorsal fins

name: Cookiecutter Shark
characteristics_favorite_food: Marlin, tuna, other sharks, stingrays, seals and whales

name: Frilled Shark

characteristics_length: 3.2 to 3.6 feet on average (males); 4.4 to 4.9 feet on average (females); maximum length of 6.4 feet

name: Great White Shark

characteristics_slogan: Can grow to more than 8 meters long!

name: Greenland Shark

characteristics_favorite_food: Greenland shark food includes fish, marine mammals and carrion.

name: Grey Reef Shark
characteristics_slogan: One of the most common shark species!

name: Hammerhead Shark
characteristics_slogan: Found in coastal waters around the world!
characteristics_predators: Tiger Shark, Great White Shark, Killer Whale, Humans

name: Manta Ray
characteristics_slogan: Can grow up to 9m wide!

name: Megamouth Shark

name: Porbeagle Shark

characteristics_other_name(s): Blunt head shark, light-tip shark, whitetip shark, reef whitetip shark, blacktip shark, black-finned shark, blackfin reef shark, reef blacktip shark, guliman, black-vee whaler, bronze whaler, Fowler's whaler shark, graceful shark, graceful whaler shark, school shark, longnose blacktail shark, shortnose blacktail shark

name: Shark
characteristics_prey: Sea lion, seals, humans, small fishes, and invertebrates
characteristics_biggest_threat: Killer whales, sperm whales and humans
characteristics_favorite_food: Sea lion, seals, humans, small fishes, and invertebrates

name: Spinner Shark

name: Stingray
characteristics_biggest_threat: Sea lions, seals, sharks, and other large fish
characteristics_slogan: It's stinger is razor-sharp or serrated!
characteristics_predators: Sea lions, seals, sharks, and other large fish
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Flattened body shape and venom filled tail

name: Tiger Shark
characteristics_slogan: The fourth biggest species of shark in the world!

name: Viper shark (dogfish)
characteristics_habitat: Deep water, upper continental slopes, seamounts.

name: Whale Shark
characteristics_habitat: Warm coastal waters and open ocean
characteristics_slogan: The largest species of fish in the world!

name: Zebra Shark
characteristics_slogan: Can get to be 30 years old in the wild!

name: Spiny Dogfish
characteristics_prey: Octopuses, crabs, squid, smaller sharks, jellyfish, shrimp, and sea cucumber
characteristics_estimated_population_siz: Biomass of 106.8 thousand metric tons in the Atlantic Ocean; 44,660,000 fish in the Pacific Ocean
characteristics_other_name(s): Dogfish Shark, Spiky Dog, Piked Dogfish, Rock Salmon, Spring Dogfish, White-Spotted Dogfish Predators: Sharks, Seals, Orcas, Tuna, American Anglerfish, Humans
characteristics_slogan: Found in ocean waters worldwide!
characteristics_lifespan: Average of 20 to 24 years, but can live up to 50 years
characteristics_length: Maximum length of 39 inches (male); maximum length of 49 inches (female)
characteristics_favorite_food: Octopuses, crabs, squid, smaller sharks, jellyfish, shrimp, and sea cucumber

name: Giant African Land Snail
characteristics_slogan: The biggest snail species on land!

name: Nudibranch
characteristics_prey: Other nudibranches or sea slugs, coral, anemones, sponges, hydrozoans, planktonic invertebrates, sea butterflies, or other sea creatures depending on the species
characteristics_predators: Other nudibranchs, turtles, some crabs, humans

name: Sea Slug
characteristics_habitat: Shallow and deep areas of oceans

name: Snail
characteristics_slogan: There are nearly 1,000 different species!
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Armoured shell with long, thin eye stems

name: Immortal Jellyfish
characteristics_predators: Larger jellyfish, sea anemones, tuna, sharks, swordfish, sea turtles, penguins
characteristics_favorite_food: Plankton, fish eggs, larvae, brine shrimp

name: Man of War Jellyfish
characteristics_other_name(s): man o'war, bluebottle, blue bottle jellyfish
characteristics_predators: loggerhead sea turtle, blue sea slug, violet sea snail

name: Christmas Island Red Crab
characteristics_gestation_period: Females brood eggs for a couple of weeks before releasing them into the sea.
characteristics_common_name: Christmas Island red crab, red land crab
characteristics_location: Indian Ocean islands of Christmas Island and Cocos Island
characteristics_length: Carapace 4.6 inches wide, males larger than females
characteristics_predators: Fish, coconut crabs, whale sharks, manta rays and other filter feeders as well as the yellow crazy ant
characteristics_age_of_molting: mature crabs molt once a year

name: Crab
characteristics_slogan: There are 93 different crab groups
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Hard, armoured shell and eight legs

name: Fiddler Crab
characteristics_prey: Dead, decaying plants and animals, bacteria, algae, and fungus
characteristics_habitat: Sandy beaches and salt or brackish water

name: Ghost Crab
characteristics_prey: Baby turtles, mole crabs and other small arthropods, mollusks, insects
characteristics_other_name(s): Sand crab, the Fleet-footed One of White
characteristics_length: 2 to 3 inches, males larger than females

name: Hermit Crab
characteristics_slogan: There are over 500 different species!

name: Horseshoe Crab
characteristics_estimated_population_siz: 2.3 to 4.5 million just on the Atlantic coast
characteristics_other_name(s): helmet crab, horsefoot, saucepan, king crab
characteristics_habitat: Shallow water off the coast, beaches
characteristics_slogan: Changed little in over 500 million years!
characteristics_weight: As much as 9 pounds in the tri-spine horseshoe crab; males of all species smaller
characteristics_length: As long as 31.25 inches in the female tri-spine horseshoe crab, other species are smaller
characteristics_predators: Shorebirds who eat the eggs, sea turtles, fish

name: Jonah Crab
characteristics_prey: Mussels (especially blue mussels), arthropods, snails, and certain species of algae
characteristics_predators: Seagulls, otters, alligators, sharks, rays, and bony fish, and humans
characteristics_distinctive_feature: Spotted color

name: King Crab
characteristics_habitat: Cold coastal waters and continental shelves
characteristics_slogan: Can have a leg span of nearly 2 meters!

name: Rock Crab
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: large brown-black claws with lighter-colored tips
characteristics_habitat: Near rocks, tide pools, and rocky marine areas.
characteristics_predators: Sand and kelp bass, other fish, seabirds, and sea otters.
characteristics_favorite_food: Worms, clams, mussels, other crabs, other invertebrates, and algae.

name: Sea Roach
characteristics_habitat: Around waterlines under rocks, near piers
characteristics_location: Coasts of Ireland, England, United States

name: Stone Crab
characteristics_length: Between 5½ to 6 inches at the carapace (the widest part of the crab)

name: Yeti Crab
characteristics_most_distinctive_feature: The white body and hairy claws

name: Krill
characteristics_predators: Whales, seals, birds, fish, and humans
characteristics_favorite_food: Both plants and animals, depending on the species
